LanguageData.BadPeople_TurnBadMessage: Sometimes life can change people ...\n{0}, after seeing horrible things on this world, has become depraved person.
LanguageData.BadPeople_TurnGoodMessage: Finally, {0} gave up the immoral lifestyle. From now on {0} will try to make this world a better place.
LanguageData.BadPeople_TurnCannibalMessage: After consuming human flesh, {0} tasted in this special meal. Eventually, {0} would like more of it.
LanguageData.BadPeople_TurnKinSlayer: {0} thinks that family is overrated. Dead of another member of family won't affect {0}
LanguageData.BadPeople_Log_ReleasingPrisoner: I witnessed releasing of prisoner, what a merciful act
LanguageData.BadPeople_Log_HarvestedOrgan: I harvested organ from a human
LanguageData.BadPeople_Log_WitnessedColonistDeath: I saw one of my people die
LanguageData.BadPeople_ShowDebugTabDesc: Show debug pawn tab with karma change log
